  • Constructor Details

    • com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.model.service.OrderService

      public com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.model.service.OrderService()

  • Method Details

    • changeOrderStatus

      public void changeOrderStatus(long orderId, BookingStatus newStatus) throws ServiceException
      Method receives an Order id and a new value of BookingStatus that has to be changed in that Order. If user wants to confirm Order (the status has to be set from BOOKING to NEW), before changing the BookingStatus, method checks it that dishes actually present in menu (to prevent the situation as user has been added dishes to his order some time ago, and only now wants to confirm the order but the dishes had been already ordered by another user). If the dishes are available for an Order, method reduces the amount of dishes in menu and that changes the BookingStatus to NEW. In case some Exception occurs during these operations, the transaction performs "rollback" and nothing be change in storage. If it needs to do the following BookingStatus changes (from NEW to COOKING, etc.), BookingStatus changes just for demonstration without any additional control.
      Parameters:
      orderId - - id of the Order that status has to be changed.
      newStatus - - new BookingStatus that has to be set in the Order.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to make changes in storage.
      EntityNotFoundException - the child of ServiceException, throws if the requested amount any of dishes are more that presented dishes in menu.

    • getAllUserOrders

      public List<Order> getAllUserOrders(User user) throws ServiceException
      Method gets the list of user Order from storage, that sorted by creation time of that Order. For every Order method set list of Baskets.
      Parameters:
      user - - current user in session.
      Returns:
      list of orders that belong to current User.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to get data from storage.

    • getAllOrders

      public Page<Order> getAllOrders(int page, int recordsPerPage, OrderSorting sorting) throws ServiceException
      Method doing calculation of Orders offset (for pagination purpose), based on the total numbers of Orders (noOfRecords). Then receives appropriate list of Orders that need to be displayed in user page, and set corresponding information to the Page.
      Parameters:
      page - - number of current Page that displays Order list for User.
      recordsPerPage - - orders amount that has to be displayed per page.
      sorting - - sorting parameter. Orders can be sorted by date or status.
      Returns:
      Page of Orders that has to be displayed in one user page.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to get data.

    • getOrCreateOrder

      public Order getOrCreateOrder(User user, String deliveryAddress, String deliveryPhone) throws ServiceException, ValidationException
      Returns an Order that firstly tries to get from storage. The Order is considered that exists in it, if the delivery address is the same as the User wants to deliver to, and the BookingStatus is "BOOKING" (an order is not confirmed by the User). If such Order doesn't exist - creates a new one from data that received from the user side (delivery address, delivery phone). As that order is new, then payment status is set to false, and the BookingStatus is "BOOKING". Other data, like id and creation is formed by storage.
      Parameters:
      user - current User in session.
      deliveryAddress - the address that Order needs to be delivered to.
      deliveryPhone - the contact phone number.
      Returns:
      an Order, from storage if it exists in it, or the new one.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to get data from storage or to write data to it.
      ValidationException - when delivery address or delivery phone is not valid.

    • addDishToOrder

      public void addDishToOrder(Order order, Dish dish, int dishesAmountInOrder) throws ServiceException, DuplicatedEntityException
      Method checks whether dishes that user wants to order are available in menu (checkAvailableDishes), if it is, creates a Basket and adds it to the Order list.
      Parameters:
      order - - current user Order.
      dish - that user wants to order.
      dishesAmountInOrder - - amount of dishes that user wants to order.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to get data from storage or to write data to it.
      DuplicatedEntityException - when dish is already exists in that order.
      IrrelevantDataException - when the amount of requested dishes exceed available ones in menu.

    • removeDishFromOrder

      public void removeDishFromOrder(long orderId, long dishId) throws ServiceException
      Method removes dishes from order. If it remains the only one dish in an order, then order will be removed completely.
      Parameters:
      orderId - Order id received from the user.
      dishId - Dish id received from the user.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - when impossible to get or to delete data from storage.

    • checkDishesIfPresent

      private void checkDishesIfPresent(DishDao dishDao, BasketDao basketDao, long orderId) throws EntityNotFoundException, DAOException
      Method receives requested dishes from a client and checks if that dishes are really present in storage. RequestedDishes - gets the requested amounts and names of the dishes within an order. PresentDishes - gets the actual amounts and names of the dishes within an order that are presents in menu. If the requested amount any of dishes are more that presented dishes in menu, method th
      Parameters:
      orderId - id of user Order.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If the requested amount any of dishes are more that presented dishes in menu, method throws the EntityAbsentException with the list of absent dishes in its message.
      DAOException

    • isOrderInConfirmingProcess

      private boolean isOrderInConfirmingProcess(BookingStatus newStatus)
      Method checks if the user wants to confirm order (the status has to be set from BOOKING to NEW).
      Parameters:
      newStatus - - new BookingStatus that has to be set in the Order.
      Returns:
      true if the BookingStatus that has to be set is "NEW". Otherwise, return false.

    • checkAvailableDishes

      private void checkAvailableDishes(Dish dish, int dishesAmountInOrder, DishDao dishDao) throws DAOException, IrrelevantDataException
      Method gets receives the number of available dishes in menu, and compares it with the request amount of dishes.
      Parameters:
      dish - that user wants to order.
      dishesAmountInOrder - - amount of dishes that user wants to order.
      Throws:
      DAOException - when impossible to get data from storage or to write data to it.
      IrrelevantDataException - when the amount of requested dishes exceed available ones in menu.

    • getTotalPrices

      public Map<Order,BigDecimal> getTotalPrices(List<Order> orders)
      Method calculates the total price of each order.
      Parameters:
      orders - list of orders which prices need to be calculated.
      Returns:
      map of orders, the keys are the orders, and values are the total prices of that order.

    • sortOrdersByPrice

      private LinkedHashMap<Order,BigDecimal> sortOrdersByPrice(Map<Order,BigDecimal> ordersAndPrices)
      Sort map by creation date of the orders.
      Parameters:
      ordersAndPrices - unsorted map.
      Returns:
      map sorted by creation date.
